ai-patthana15.30:0.2_0: Living in the teaching, they are included in the discourses and found, as it’s amazing.
ai-patthana15.30:0.3_0: Next there are buds, copper, and bride.
ai-patthana15.30:1.1_0: Loss of the skillful teaching is not guarded by contentment,
ai-patthana15.30:1.1_1: ‘... for the sake of two years.’ ...
ai-patthana15.30:2.1_0: Judging is unskilled in the unskillful, not the causes and reason for the reason.
ai-patthana15.30:2.1_1: ‘... for the sake of one day.’ ...
ai-patthana15.30:3.1_0: Lohicca doesn’t have any declared cause or condition for contentment.
ai-patthana15.30:3.1_1: ‘... for the sake of two years.’ ...
